name: Xtreme Beach Stunt: Offroad Hummer Track
name_original: Xtreme Beach Stunt: Offroad Hummer Track
description:
Drive your favorite and latest heavy monster truck, in the safari desert, this is the off-road truck driving time of the year 2017, filled with the adventure and utmost pleasure, joy. Ride this Xtreme Beach Stunt Hummer Driven on Offroad Track, in the racing and safari rally entertainment, this is an easy and intuitive game, where the rider is the gameboy, who has to look at the players in racing tracks, and then there is an endless competition between the racers and you, give them a tough time, try to be the best player in this hummer beach racing tracks game. 3D simulation lovers, who want to play racer, thriller and undertaking heavy duty 4x4 riding game. Travelling is always a fun, get on the seats.

Drive the Xtreme Beach Stunt Hummer Driven on Offroad Track in this ultimate mission based thrilling game, heavy trucks and hummers are adding to the addictive gameplay as well as there is an intuitive 3D HD racing environment developed for racing lovers, try your luck, become the champion, win the medal and participate again. Finish all levels in a row.
